LicenseCategories.title: Choose your <primary>dream</primary> driving license
LicenseCategories.subtitle: Choose a course from our wide range to best suit your time and individual needs.

leftCategories.title: Buses
leftCategories.description: The course prepares for driving buses with more than 8 passengers, includes theoretical preparation and practical driving in real traffic. A condition is meeting the legal age and health fitness for obtaining a driving license.

leftCategories.title: Truck combinations
leftCategories.description: Group C training teaches how to drive vehicles over 3.5 tons, the C+E extension adds driving with a trailer over 750 kg; includes theory, maneuvering and driving in real traffic.

centerLeftCategory.title: Motorcycles
centerLeftCategory.description: We offer complete motorcycle training for groups AM, A1, A2 and A: from 15 years for AM, 16 years for A1, 18 years for A2 and 24 years (or after 2 years of holding A2) for A. It includes theoretical and practical training on the training ground and in road traffic. Supplementary exams A1→A2 and A2→A are provided, additional conditional rides can be purchased. A condition is health fitness and a valid application for training.

centerRightCategory.title: Buses
centerRightCategory.description: Entitles to drive motor vehicles up to a total weight of 3.5 tons and a maximum of 8 passengers plus the driver (possibly with a trailer up to 750 kg, if the total weight of the driving set does not exceed 3.5 tons). It also entitles to drive tractors and self-propelled working machines with a maximum permissible weight of up to 3.5 tons.

rightCategories.title: Tractors
rightCategories.description: The Group T course prepares you for driving self-propelled working machines with a maximum speed of 40 km/h, including off-road and road driving. It requires reaching the specified age, medical fitness, and successful completion of exams.

rightCategories.title: Driver training
rightCategories.description: Professional training for professional drivers includes basic and periodic courses focused on safety, legislation, and operation of a digital tachograph. It is intended for holders of the relevant driving license and requires valid medical fitness according to regulations.

StepsToGettingALicense.title: Steps to getting a <primary>driver's license</primary>
StepsToGettingALicense.perex: Follow the steps and successfully obtain your driving licence with STAR Driving School.

steps.title: Fill in the application
steps.description: Fill in the application form with your personal details and we will offer you a suitable date and form of tuition.

steps.title: Theory & eTests
steps.description: Learn the rules of the road and practice them with eTests to prepare for your theory test.

steps.title: Practical driving
steps.description: Gain driving experience under the supervision of professional instructors in real traffic and complex traffic situations.

steps.title: Exams & License
steps.description: After completing theory and driving, we will register you for the test. Once you pass, you'll get your driver's license and can set off to pursue your dreams.

BetterExperience.title: Why choose <primary>us?</primary>
BetterExperience.description: With us, you will not only learn to drive safely and confidently, but you will also enjoy the whole process. Thanks to clear instruction, patient instructors, and a supportive environment, you will master every step without unnecessary stress. We believe that quality preparation can also be a pleasant experience.

features.title: Individual approach to everyone
features.description: We realize that every student is different - some feel more confident behind the wheel, others need more time and support. We will adapt to your pace and find a teaching method that suits you. Our goal is not just to prepare you for exams, but mainly for real traffic.

features.title: Experienced and patient instructors
features.description: Our team consists of professionals with many years of experience who can remain calm in any situation. They explain everything clearly, without unnecessary stress or pressure. Thanks to their approach, you will feel safe and confident during training.

features.title: Modern theory and online tools
features.description: You can complete the theoretical part comfortably from home. You have access to online e-tests and well-organized study materials that will effectively prepare you for exams.

features.title: Practical driving without stress
features.description: From the very first moment behind the wheel to the final exam, you will practice in real traffic conditions with emphasis on your comfort and safety. The goal is to gain not only skills but also the confidence needed for independent driving.

features.title: High success rate in exams
features.description: Our thorough preparation is reflected in the results. The vast majority of our students successfully pass their exams on the first attempt. We know what to focus on and how to support you to get your license as quickly as possible.

ContactAndLocation.mainHeading: We will pick you up on your way to getting a driver's license
ContactAndLocation.description: You don't have to worry about how you'll get to your lessons - we'll pick you up directly at a place that suits you. Choose from our pick-up points in Bílina and its surroundings and let us pamper you:
ContactAndLocation.contactSubheading: LEAVE US YOUR CONTACT AND WE WILL GET BACK TO YOU

Footer.companyDescription: Professional driving school with long tradition in Bílina and surroundings. We specialize in quality driving instruction for all vehicle categories with an individual approach to each student.

Hero.description: We will teach you to drive from scratch, in a friendly team and at a fair price. At Autoškola Star, we will prepare you for final exams, whether you are a complete beginner or a professional driver.
